channel.title: side on The Open Source Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in side on The Open Source Cookbook

item.title: Corn Bread
item.description: Ingredients 1 cup of cornmeal 3/4 cup of all-purpose flour 2-4 tablespoons of sugar 2 1/2 teaspoons of baking powder 1/2 teaspoon of salt 1 cup of milk 2 eggs 1/4 cup of butter, melted Directions Preheat oven to 400Â°F. Grease an 8x8x2-inch square or 9x1 1/2-inch round baking pan; set aside. In a medium bowl stir together cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt; set aside. In a small bowl whisk together the milk, eggs, and butter.

item.title: Guacamole
item.description: Ingredients 3 avocados - peeled, pitted, and mashed 1 lime, juiced 1 teaspoon salt 1/2 cup diced onion 3 tablespoons chopped fresh cilantro 2 roma (plum) tomatoes, diced 1 teaspoon minced garlic 1 pinch ground cayenne pepper Directions In a medium bowl, mash together the avocados, lime juice, and salt. Mix in onion, cilantro, tomatoes, and garlic. Stir in cayenne pepper. Refrigerate 1 hour for best flavor, or serve immediately.
